name: list_top_tracks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Fetches the weekly or daily top tracks from Spotify for a specified region and date.

region.description: The region code in ISO 3166 alpha-2 format (e.g., 'US'). Defaults to 'global'.

type.description: The time span for the chart. Defaults to 'weekly'.

date.description: The date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.
